verses.name: Numbers 8:1
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,

verses.name: Numbers 8:2
verses.text: Speak unto Aaron, and say unto him, When thou lightest the lamps, the seven lamps shall give light over against the candlestick.

verses.name: Numbers 8:3
verses.text: And Aaron did so; he lighted the lamps thereof over against the candlestick, as the Lord commanded Moses.

verses.name: Numbers 8:4
verses.text: And this work of the candlestick was of beaten gold, unto the shaft thereof, unto the flowers thereof, was beaten work: according unto the pattern which the Lord had shewed Moses, so he made the candlestick.

verses.name: Numbers 8:5
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,
